original: Lundgren, Per-Olof, kommunalsekreterare, Trollhättan, f. 20/3/04 i Er-ska, Älvsb. 1., av Anton L. o. Mathilda Andersdotter. — Stud:ex. i Skara 23, jur. kand. i Lund 28. Tings-tjg. v. Flundre, Väne o. Bjärke doms. 28-31, kommunalsekr. i Trollhättan sed. 32. Överförmynd. sed. 34, led. av styr. f. Trollhättans Sparbank sed. 44.
translated: Lundgren, Per-Olof, municipal secretary, Trollhättan, b. 20/3/04 in Er-ska, Älvsb. 1st, son of Anton L. and Mathilda Andersdotter. - Graduated from high school in Skara 23, received a law degree from Lund in 28. Served as a court clerk in Flundre, Väne, and Bjärke districts from 28 to 31, became a municipal secretary in Trollhättan in 32. Appointed as a guardian in 34, became a member of the board for Trollhättans Sparbank in 44.
